name: Frost Warding
baseDescription: Increases the armor and resistances given by your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by 15%.  In addition, gives your Frost Ward a 10% chance to reflect Frost spells and effects while active.

name: Improved Frostbolt
baseDescription: Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.2 sec.

name: Elemental Precision
baseDescription: Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Frost and Fire spells by 2%.

name: Ice Shards
baseDescription: Increases the range of your Fire spells by 3 yards.

name: Frostbite
baseDescription: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Blast spell by 1.5 sec.

name: Improved Frost Nova
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire Blast and Scorch spells by 4%.

name: Permafrost
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike chance of your Flamestrike spell by 5%.

name: Piercing Ice
baseDescription: Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 148 to 195 Fire damage and an additional 56 Fire damage over 12 sec.

name: Cold Snap
baseDescription: When activated, this spell finishes the cooldown on all of your Frost spells.

name: Improved Blizzard
baseDescription: Adds a chill effect to your Blizzard spell.  This effect lowers the target's movement speed by 50%.  Lasts 1.50 sec.

name: Arctic Reach
baseDescription: Increases the range of your Frostbolt and Blizzard spells and the radius of your Frost Nova and Cone of Cold spells by 10%.

name: Frost Channeling
baseDescription: Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by 5% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by 10%.

name: Shatter
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by 20%.

name: Ice Block
baseDescription: A wave of flame radiates outward from the caster, damaging all enemies caught within the blast for 159 to 192 Fire damage, and dazing them for 6 sec.

name: Improved Cone of Cold
baseDescription: Increases the damage dealt by your Cone of Cold spell by 25%.

name: Winter's Chill
baseDescription: Gives your Frost damage spells a 40% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by 2% for 15 sec.  Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Ice Barrier
baseDescription: Instantly shields you, absorbing 455 damage.  Lasts 1 min.  While the shield holds, spells will not be interrupted.
